title: Kate Winslet's Story: Dealing with Media Attention
summary: Kate Winslet is a famous actress who became a star after acting in the movie Titanic. She talks about how the media and photographers followed her everywhere, which made her feel scared and unhappy. They looked through her trash and asked stores about her shopping to guess what she ate. To feel better, she did simple things like having a good meal, talking with friends, listening to music, and going to the bathroom. She also remembers being teased about her body when she was younger and seeing her pictures changed in magazines. Winslet says support from friends helped her through tough times.
